website_summaries.verdict: The densely packed camouflage material on this suit provides perfect coverage, but you will leave a trail of camouflage wherever you go.
pros: Suit consists of a mask, jacket, pants, gun cover, and a stuff sack
Thick camouflage material on a breathable, mesh frame
Provides excellent cover in brush and woods
cons: Sheds threads easily while also being a magnet for every leaf and twig in the forest

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Halloween costume... Mission accomplished, but with some clean up thereafter
customer_reviews.text: This was what my 11-year old son chose to wear for Halloween, and boy was he popular. Non hunters thought that he was some sort of "Swamp Thing" monster. And hunters/military folks walked up to him and said... "Nice Ghillie Suit." He thoroughly enjoyed himself with his friends at parties and trick-or-treating. The only drawback is that this thing sheds like crazy. We have been picking up the threads all over the place, and spent the better part of an hour picking up after our son at our church building where he wore it for an event.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Ghillie Suit Bought For Elk Hunting Trial Run
customer_reviews.text: Purchased ghillie suit (jacket pants and hood with rifle wrap) as a trial run for elk hunting this year Dec 2019. The adult large size fits over hunting jacket & pants without issues, covering boots too. Hood is a good fit as well. Rap for rifle covers entire rifle. Will have to improvise for scope with burlap or mess. Most Hunter's / snipers would make their own ghillie suits, but you can't beat the price for this ghillie suit. It does however leave stragglers with strands falling out, but overall satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EaglesN3st

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: My son actually convince me to get him this as his Halloween costume this year. It was a huge hit at the costume party especially since it was outdoors and a bonfire. He hasn't actually used it to go hunting yet but it works really well for manhunt and airsoft or paintball games.
customer_reviews.author: J Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Never saw it com in’. Light & breathable. Some shed.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cotton string to clip natural seasonal brush to. I’ve always wanted one since I was a kid and now, because of Halloween, I FINALLY have one. I hope there are trick’r’treaters this novel Covid year. The mesh facemask is good for mosquitos and no-see-ems but also able to let enough dusk light in to see where the deer(trick ‘er treaties) are posted. *note when being stalked by the average trick-or-teater it’s important not to give away your surprise position too soon. Timing is key. For a nice touch to the moment of pounce I purchased a 11$ OLED stitched Japanese demon mask to turn on the moment they start to investigate me as a shrub! GG
customer_reviews.author: Abitaskew

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: This ghillie suit is outstanding! It fit as expected and came in a nice mesh field bag. Once you shake each piece to loosen it up, it really fills out and breaks up your contour. Light weight so you can take it with you on hunts. Great for stalking game, paint ball, or anything outdoors requiring you to blend into your surroundings. I also want to commend VIVO for excellent customer service. I had an problem outside of their control and they were prompt, professional, and solved it for me with no issues. That alone is worthy of 5 stars! Great product and great company.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Looks like pictures. Will last. Picks up dirt easily.
customer_reviews.text: 11 yo son used this as a Halloween costume. He ran hot in it during the day, but perfect at night (we live in Southern Cal). With sweatshirt/sweatpants underneath it’d be perfect for northeast climates. He LOVED this costume. We had to return our first order (youth l/xl) as it was too short in the legs. Next size up (Adult m/l) ran too long, but was better than too short. Just dragged a bit. Waist cinches with a cord, so fits multiple waistlines. He is 5’2”, 105 lbs. The suit sheds slightly, but not badly. Not itchy, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie at heart

customer_reviews.title: Comes small in size
customer_reviews.text: The ghillie suit is small. I ordered the largest one they had. Im 6 ft at 250 pounds. Good for a fast event but not a polonged event. For 54 bucks its ok. I dont like the snap buttons. They come unsnaped when low crawling. Material is cheap quality. Any the box it came in was opened. I will not return it but i will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this ghillie suit for a character stream that myself and a few fellow streamers took part in, and everybody LOVED IT! It looks great, it's very comfortable and lightweight, and the included rifle wrap was a great addition. The only negative I have to say is that after a single use for airsoft, I noticed a couple of the strands had gotten caught and fell off. Not a big issue considering the price point is great and I was also running around through bushes and trees. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great halloween costume!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suit last year for a halloween party and it was great. The only downfall to this suit is the face part and overall it can get very hot. Air flow is not the best with this suit and you start sweating easily if you're not in a cool place.
customer_reviews.author: Yad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome suit! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit for the money! I don’t normally leave reviews but know some people have complained about it shedding. Of course it’s going to lose a few strands here and there there’s prob 20000 strands on the suit at least! I mainly bought is for Halloween to get some good scares and laughs in but I imagine would be awesome for hunting as well or a good game of hide and seek in the woods!! From just trying it on in the house it was comfortable fit as described and was actually warmer than I thought it’d be!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Walker

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use as a Halloween costume. We ordered the XL. My husband 5’10” 195lbs and it fits comfortably. It does have an elastic waste for extra room. Looking forward to surprising some trick or treaters!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Slis

customer_reviews.title: Was a hit! Great Conversation Piece.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. We weren’t looking to spend a ton, but wanted a costume that would truly look natural enough to be able to hide & jump out at people. The costume was a hit! It did shed some strings, but nothing that was problematic or excessive.
customer_reviews.author: Boze Family

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Halloween costume for my son. He wears a size 14 and it fit perfect with room to grow. But not like too much room it was very comfortable but also kept him warm during trick or treating in our cold weather. If your getting it for a costume or hunting it’s great for both. It’s very durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Dolatowski

customer_reviews.title: Can't see me
customer_reviews.text: This was to be worn during Halloween for hiding in the front yard. Right out of the packaging it was ready to wear and looked great. Easy to put on, good fit and not uncomfortable. Conceals the human figure well. Only down side is that it sheds, which is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: deadman31299

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband and son for hunting young gobbler, turkey and deer. They said they fit really well and they’re not too bad weight wise. I like the little bag that comes with it so you can store it in there when not in use. They seem to be very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Um...not quite the fullness of the image we see online
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the smallest size for our 9 year old son and it fits him great. The suit isn't nearly as full and shaggy looking as the suit in the online selling images. Overall my son loves it. However, we wish it looked more full.
customer_reviews.author: MovieMike

customer_reviews.title: Smelled TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a costume and made the mistake of not opening it until the day of the party. It smelled so bad that I could only wear it long enough to walk into the party, I had to take it off and throw it outside.
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: The actual suit part is nice though - mesh fabric that is breathable
customer_reviews.text: The suit is decent but there is a lot of spaces where the ghillie yarn is missing. The yarn is also loosely sewed on so I've had a lot of string fall out so far. I'm going to try to fix it by shoe goo-ing some ghillie netting on and tying ghillie string to that. The actual suit part is nice though - mesh fabric that is breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: String. Effin. Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It really looks the part I have to say, but there is one fatal flaw in its stealth. The string in the suit falls out for seemingly no cause. With one pass across the office floor no fewer than a hundred threads fell out creating a gigantic mess. You could track my movements all day, from my car to my desk to the coffee pot back to my desk, where I took it off and cleaned up the trail of yarn I had left. Good for a photo op, but otherwise I would not recommend buying this if you plan on moving with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has some problems but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for airsoft and it hasn't disappointed, for being a cheaper suit it's better than I thought it would be. When I got it it lost a lot of strings for a while but after some use it stopped. Its light weight and breathable, however, after cramming it into its little travel bag you have to mess with it to make it lay the way you want. Overall a good ghillie suit for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Used for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: While everybody was focused on the clowns in my yard they never saw me coming in the Ghillie suite. Perfect for scaring on Halloween. Also, we had a cold halloween and it kept me toasty warm. Got lots of compliments from the dads.
customer_reviews.author: Alasdair Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Quality suit
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and perfect for my purpose. Camouflage anywhere night or day with this. Quality workmanship too. Simple to put on and off. It’s a 3 piece suit. Can’t beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad ghillie suit for the price. The materials used do not seem extremely durable as strings have already came off nine taking it out of its package but it will do its job and its not a bad product at all for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnny

customer_reviews.title: And now they all want one...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to run through the yard at night playing in this.. yes.. he is 18.. yes I know but then we all still dress up right? I highly recommend this product as he loves it and now his father wants his own.. sigh. I apparently did not buy him one a few years back.. funny
customer_reviews.author: AR Grover

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it. I got it for my son to use for Halloween & later for hunting. The string pieces come off a lot but there are so many you can't tell unless you are cleaning up after. I'm not sure if that's normal or if it's because it's a cheap suit. Great suit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: brandon rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for my use...Halloween. Nice mesh material in vest portion was a treat as it kept me from overheating in Florida. Size seems to run a bit large except the the head and face portion which is tight(and yes I have a normal size head). Overall very good quality especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: audrey casce

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Instead of buying a costume one I bought a real one and my son loved it for Halloween, and he’s excited to be able to run around in the yard and hide from friends
customer_reviews.author: TJ WEBER

customer_reviews.title: Great for deer hunting
customer_reviews.text: Used this suit deer hunting with a crossbow on the ground. If you cut open a section of a bush and sit yourself in the bush, deer have absolutely no idea your there. Had 22 deer from 3-20 yards. At 3 yards they’ll look at you funny and walk off but complete cover at 20 yards.
customer_reviews.author: kara leyland

customer_reviews.title: Good for a Halloween costume, not good for hunting.
customer_reviews.text: Ghillie suits work because they allow people to blend into their surroundings. This thing smells so strongly of chemicals that I'm pretty sure every critter in the woods could smell me and knew right where I was. I sprayed it with scent killer, washed it with a scent killer detergent and it still smells like chemicals. Good for a Halloween costume, but not good for hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Holloway

customer_reviews.title: It's a little small on me, which I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little small on me, which I expected, but I will make it work for me. I wouldn't trade it for anything. I will order again if I ever need to, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well. High quality.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear Large shirts but this XL suit fits very well. The warmth lets you wear less under it but its not too warm. Slides on surprisingly easy. Stretchy material adjusts to body well.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: No too bad.
customer_reviews.text: The suit fits as advertised. The threads are falling off in large quantities, I'm not sure if that is normal. The hat is separate and is hard to figure out. All in all it is a solid buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if you could swap sizes so everything would fit.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5”/170 lbs I ordered the youth size for the pants size I wear 34-30 pants. The top was too small to wear but the pants fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: BlakeEWeb

customer_reviews.title: Not your average camo suit
customer_reviews.text: This suit should do its job, kind of on the warmer side due to lots of strings hanging from it to resemble moss. I do not think I'm capable of getting it back into its pouch for it was packed with precision. For the price it's a great tool for the stalker.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Lepine

customer_reviews.title: Great camouflage for hunting!
customer_reviews.text: The drawstring that tightens the waist isn't strong enough. It does a great job of camouflaging me while I'm deer hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Poston

customer_reviews.title: I was worried it would not fit my 11 year ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it would not fit my 11 year old that is usually a large youth, size 14/16. It fit with plenty of room and there's room to spare so he gets extra time out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Lacey

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than anticpated
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 suits prior, different brands, and this one will be purchased again when needed. Colors were as advertised and the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: David Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Best Halloween Costume!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son said this was the BEST Halloween!!! He loved his ghillie suit! He scared sooo many people he’s wearing it again next year! He left a trail of fabric everywhere he went but there is plenty left. Also he picked up leaves wherever he lay to hide lol! Getting one for my nephew! So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mom24

customer_reviews.title: Worked out great
customer_reviews.text: My son is 5ft, 6in. It fit him fine other than the legs being a little long. He wore this as a Halloween costume and it worked perfectly for that.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Buckler

customer_reviews.title: Fantabulous costume!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this costume!! Well built, comfortable, and probably the best costume my son has ever had, considering it's here four days before Halloween and he's not planning to take it off, like, ever... 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Youth Ghillie
customer_reviews.text: My son is 10 and this fit him perfect. I was concerned about sizing because it o my stating youth with some measurements, but I took my chances. It’s a good product for the price. We did buy camp gloves and face paint to add to it.
customer_reviews.author: Keri K

customer_reviews.title: Great disguise
customer_reviews.text: Great disguise for hunting and other uses where you need to hide (eg; Halloween).
customer_reviews.author: CJPhotovision

customer_reviews.title: best halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: my son in this costume was a hit on a halloween parties this year! very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for a Halloween costume and it was a hit came worked out great! Fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Gillie Suit
customer_reviews.text: Suggest to go one size bigger than what you are. Light weight and comfort good quality and covers it's easy to attach additional items like long grass and leaves.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: The life of the party!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for a couple of parties and Halloween. It’s was perfect for my needs and was a huge hit. However, I don’t think I’d actually take this hunting unless it was just in a stand. I’d be looking for something a little more durable if I was using this for its intended purpose. I’d classify this as a costume more than a durable professional grade ghillie.
customer_reviews.author: kevin s.

customer_reviews.title: Need an edge for camouflage?
customer_reviews.text: It fits good and works real well. I recommend it for most hunters.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great camouflage but it sheds a bit.
customer_reviews.text: My husband used it as a costume for Halloween to blend in with the bushes so he could scare people. It worked well. He had fun.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer schutze

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered another one and it was horrible (looked cheap and was not full/fluffy). We ordered this one to replace and it is PERFECT! Very good quality and it is very full/fluffy! It is worth spending a little more to get this one rather than the cheaper versions. My son is very happy and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Dede Roque

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: Fabric was super thin and low durability, the jutes were sparse, and the "one size fits all" must have meant in Asia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... you want something to toy around with this is nice, But TBH there are some flaws
customer_reviews.text: If you want something to toy around with this is nice, But TBH there are some flaws. 1st. The strings of it fall out when just putting it on and 2nd if you go in leaves or sticks it will pick them up.
customer_reviews.author: Techno

customer_reviews.title: Good suit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Parts are sort of thin. This outfit fit my 5'7" son weighing between 170-200lbs. Good suit for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diana C. Kickery

customer_reviews.title: My boys like this item.
customer_reviews.text: My middle son (16) wanted this for his high school nerf gun wars! Lol! And my youngest son (13) wants to use it hunting. Seems to fit them well and will serve its purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Glogolf

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and adjustable. Fun to wear!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Halloween and my son loved it! He even wears it skiing and has so many fun compliments! It gets a bit tangled but a year later it is not ripped or anything. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Whatever size you think fits...go bigger. Even after making it work, it was very patchy in areas so that the person underneath could still be seen. But being on the lighter side of cost, you get what you pay for. Comes in an impossibly small (after removed) carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Babberl

customer_reviews.title: Problem is it sheds string everywhere and picks up everything off the ground like a magnet
customer_reviews.text: Wore the for halloween and it was a hit. Problem is it sheds string everywhere and picks up everything off the ground like a magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. When shopping....compare the weight...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Not the least expensive option but looks great. Did drop a decent amount of threads.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It's SO COOL! I looks just like the real military one
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES IT! It's SO COOL! I looks just like the real military one. He will have the coolest costume at school on Halloween! Sized perfectly, too. It's really well made so I'm sure his little brother will inherit it and love it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Woman/Career/Mom/Wife/Sister/Grand-daughter

customer_reviews.title: ... to fluff it out but the end result was great. Elk walked within 10 yards and never new ...
customer_reviews.text: It took an hour to fluff it out but the end result was great. Elk walked within 10 yards and never new what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: We used it as Bigfoot haloween costume, it was the hit of the party!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Deffina

customer_reviews.title: Urban use only.
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple hours of use in and out of the woods the "yarn" came unraveled and turned into Velcro for debris.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great costume and I'd assume it's use in a more ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our Halloween haunted house and no one saw him coming! Great costume and I'd assume it's use in a more tactical would be just as good.
customer_reviews.author: CaveatEmptor

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'4 and 275 lbs and it fits much better than I expected. I would buy this even at 6'5 and 350 with good confidence. Good price, good gillie. The rifle covering is ok but just a strand of elastic line you can wrap around, so not a sleeve or full covering.
customer_reviews.author: James Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Strange Smell
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY FOR HUNTING!!! It’s smells terrible and I can’t get that strange smell out of it. I had three deer immediately smell me from 70 yards away even though there was very little wind, all my clothing was super clean, and I hadnt sweat during that hunt.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Messner

customer_reviews.title: My son used this as a Halloween costume this year ...
customer_reviews.text: My son used this as a Halloween costume this year. The material the suit is made of left a trail wherever he went, but still served it's purpose. Handy carrying bag
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it to hunt down in florida so it's hot down here and he does just fine with it. Cant even see him in the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffa G

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Got this item faster than expected. Much better than described.. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Good camp pattern but curled and shrank after getting wet in the rain
customer_reviews.author: Michael Baird

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Wanted one since I was a kid, it's comfy and includes the rifle cover. 100%satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Monday

customer_reviews.title: True to what you see
customer_reviews.text: Good coverage. Let it hang when you receive it. It needs to air out for a bit. We placed it in a tote with some earth sent wafers to help mask some of that odor over and above using descenter.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Works good, add vegetation, prepare for heat and strings.
customer_reviews.text: Strings come off that’s bout it, they come off kinda often if they are pulled on. It gets pretty hot in it but that’s to be expected. It works great tho, I suggest adding actual grass since some of the strings are brighter than actual vegetation but just weave or tie some grass and leafs on and you are set!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Would work but not for long term multiple use.
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended but would not sustain the rough brush in the hills in central california. Lots of sharp strong branches catching and will tear this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Skoolies R us

customer_reviews.title: This suit is pretty much what I had expected
customer_reviews.text: This suit is pretty much what I had expected. Although the first time I had put it on it shed a lot of the material that I had to clean up. I do believe that if it holds together I will be able to get closer to wildlife.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Binkley

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my nephew. He’s 8 years old and fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Liz and Roger

customer_reviews.title: Hides you well
customer_reviews.text: Can’t see my son when I’m 3 for away from him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used this for holloween
customer_reviews.text: I scared a lot of trick or treaters. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sean W

customer_reviews.title: I loved this suit it was perfect for airsoft and blended ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this suit it was perfect for airsoft and blended in nicely while I was hunting, my only complaint is that it sheds like nobody's business every time I'm done using it I have to go and pick up lots of its string but other than that great product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly J Parry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son used this for paint balling and stole the show.. I recommend for hardcore paint ballers
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive, but held up in the rainy weather
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value, wore this as a Halloween costume on a cold night. Kept me warm and cool. Breathable when it needed to be.
customer_reviews.author: K ro

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween!
customer_reviews.text: This was used for a Halloween costume and it was a hit! The strings do get everywhere but that is to be expected. The suit is breathable as well, so you don't get too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Great for play!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It is awesome. You might want to know that it is bad for going in and out of house, as leaves stick to it. This is great for real camo, but my son uses it to play and he drags in all sorts of leaves and twigs!
customer_reviews.author: Iguanadama

customer_reviews.title: Not the best!!
customer_reviews.text: It fits very comfortable however the make of it is not the best by any means. The openings under where the hairs sit are to big. You can almost see through it. If you're looking for a good quality like military gear dont get this one. My son will love it for scaring people though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Osterhold

customer_reviews.title: Sheds like a sheepdog!
customer_reviews.text: You cant put this on without strings falling off immediately. Its only been worn indoors so far and its thinned out quite a bit. If you are OK with it only lasting one season - then its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Frickey

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it but it SHEDS really bad. We had to put it in a bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it but it SHEDS really bad. We had to put it in a bag when not in use. Would recommend for a cheap play toy for kids
customer_reviews.author: AC34

customer_reviews.title: Using for halloween
customer_reviews.text: Using as Halloween costume and 11 y/o loves it. Fits exactly per measurements and looking forward to loads of good old fashion scares ..
customer_reviews.author: Christa B.

customer_reviews.title: Sheds, but is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a funny Halloween costume for work. It was perfect! Sheds like crazy though. I left a trail of strings everywhere I went.
customer_reviews.author: rlmb588

customer_reviews.title: A stringy mess
customer_reviews.text: Made out of strands of yarn it seems and they fall out all over the place. Went to try it on and spent 20 mins retracing my steps picking up strings. Not sure how long you can use it before they all end up falling out haha
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Riley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible products
customer_reviews.text: My kids asked me to buy 4, and all of them start falling apart making mess of strings everywhere. They look garbage and they actually are.
customer_reviews.author: Kdb

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it!! He’s a 11 and the youth large was just a bit small on the sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Blands

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my son for Halloween and it looks good and comes in its own carry bag for storage
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Halloween and it looks good and comes in its own carry bag for storage. Only complaint is the little strands fall off quite easily so after wearing it and putting it back up, there will be about a dozen strands on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Partyof5

customer_reviews.title: A great start for a build
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a base and built it up from there. The best ghillie is the one you build and this is a good start.
customer_reviews.author: Tug Speedman

customer_reviews.title: Great but sheds
customer_reviews.text: I would have give it 5 stars but it does shed but overall comfortable light weight good mobility I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this - so far it has held up really well to guerrilla warfare in the back yard and Halloween trick or treater scares. We may even eventually use it for its intended use, but for now, he is having a blast with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Jassmann Sharlock

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this Ghillie suit
customer_reviews.text: It did not look like the advertised picture. The moss camouflage was sparse and did not cover the body as was pictured. In some places it was overly thick in other places it was extremely thin. I suspect that there is very little quality control at the factory where these suits were made.
customer_reviews.author: william phillpott

customer_reviews.title: Great but falls apart
customer_reviews.text: When I got it and put it on, it was amazing. I actually went outside to some brush across the street and no one could really see me. One thing I don't really like is all the strings that fall off of it and I hope that all of them don't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly when they said. Looks perfect. My son wore it for hours after it arrive and didn’t want to take it off. It does shed a bit so hoping that will be temporary as we break it in.
customer_reviews.author: mclawsdouglas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This suit fits my grandson and it was a Christmas gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl7

customer_reviews.title: Misleading original price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits fine but not the best quality. Also the original price is misleading. You can buy this suit retail for $40-$45 anywhere. It is not discounted as it leads you to believe
customer_reviews.author: madisdad2

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has been wanting a ghillie shut for a while now, so I looked around at diferent suits for a while and read all the diferent reviews and this one seemed to be the best so I got it and I totally love it especially since my boyfriend hasn't stopped talking bout it with everybody he can't wait to take it elk hunting next year
customer_reviews.author: Theresa W

feature_bullets: VIVO GHILLIE SUIT - Adult M/L Woodland Camo
INCLUDES - 5 Pieces: Mask, Jacket, Pants, Gun Cover and Stuff Sack
CAMOUFLAGE - The Ultimate Lightweight 3D Camouflage concealment
